com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.basic

Class BasicDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.AbstractDataSet<DataTable>
      • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.basic.BasicDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSet<DataTable>

    public class BasicDataSet
extends AbstractDataSet<DataTable>
    The BasicDataSet class provides a simple implementation of the DataSet interface.

    • Method Detail

      • transferTable

        protected DataTable transferTable(DataTable table)
        Description copied from class: AbstractDataSet
        Transfer a given data table to the type specified by this data set. This allows arbitrary data tables to be added to this data set.
        Specified by:
        transferTable in class AbstractDataSet<DataTable>
        Parameters:
        table - The data table to be transferred.
        Returns:
        a copy of table transferred to this data set's table type.

      • addTable

        public DataTable addTable(TableSchema schema)
        Description copied from interface: DataSet
        Add a table to this data set via a table schema definition. This will only add a table with the defined structure, data must be added using one of the various DataTable methods. This method may be unimplemented, but in that case DataSet.addTable(DataTable) must be implemented.
        Specified by:
        addTable in interface DataSet<DataTable>
        Overrides:
        addTable in class AbstractDataSet<DataTable>
        Parameters:
        schema - The schema defining the table to add to this data set.
        Returns:
        the new table, as it exists in the data set.
